entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 22 this evening then steady. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
